entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is being given a present by Harry Potter. He squeaks tentatively when asking for the present.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is giving Dobby a present and says he has something for Dobby too.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon's old socks are being given to Dobby as a present.

relationships.description: Harry Potter gives a present to Dobby, which is actually his old socks.
The socks given to Dobby belonged to Uncle Vernon.
